name: dance
description: Make those cursors dance with Kakoune-inspired keybindings.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: yarn run generate && yarn run compile

dance.enabled.description: Controls whether the Dance keybindings are enabled.

dance.normalMode.lineHighlight.markdownDescription: Controls the line highlighting applied to active lines in normal mode. Can be an hex color, a [theme color](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color) or null.

dance.insertMode.lineHighlight.markdownDescription: Controls the line highlighting applied to active lines in insert mode. Can be an hex color, a [theme color](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color) or null.

dance.normalMode.lineNumbers.description: Controls the display of line numbers in normal mode.

dance.insertMode.lineNumbers.description: Controls the display of line numbers in insert mode.

dance.normalMode.cursorStyle.description: Controls the cursor style in normal mode.

dance.insertMode.cursorStyle.description: Controls the cursor style in insert mode.

dance.selections.allowEmpty.description: Controls whether selections can be empty. If false, each selection will have at least one character.

commands.title: Toggle
commands.description: Toggles Dance key bindings.

commands.title: Set mode to Normal
commands.description: Set Dance mode to Normal.

commands.title: Set mode to Insert
commands.description: Set Dance mode to Insert.

commands.title: Temporary normal mode
commands.description: Switches to normal mode temporarily.

commands.title: Temporary insert mode
commands.description: Switches to insert mode temporarily.

commands.title: Insert before
commands.description: Start insert before the current selections.

commands.title: Insert after
commands.description: Start insert after the current selections.

commands.title: Insert at line start
commands.description: Start insert at line start of each selection.

commands.title: Insert at line end
commands.description: Start insert at line end of each selection.

commands.title: Insert new line below
commands.description: Create new line and start insert below.

commands.title: Insert new line above
commands.description: Create new line and start insert above.

commands.title: Add new line below
commands.description: Add a new line below, without entering insert mode.

commands.title: Add new line above
commands.description: Add a new line above, without entering insert mode.

commands.title: Repeat last insert-mode change
commands.description: Repeat last insert-mode change.

commands.description: Move left.

commands.description: Move right.

commands.description: Move up.

commands.description: Scroll half a page up.

commands.title: Scroll half a page down
commands.description: Scroll half a page down.

commands.title: Select to
commands.description: Select to the next character pressed, including it.

commands.title: Select until
commands.description: Select until the next character pressed, excluding it.

commands.title: Select whole buffer
commands.description: Select whole buffer.

commands.title: Select line
commands.description: Select line on which the end of each selection lies (or next line when end lies on an end-of-line).

commands.title: Select to line beginning
commands.description: Select to line beginning.

commands.title: Select to line end
commands.description: Select to line end.

commands.title: Select enclosing characters
commands.description: Select enclosing characters.

commands.title: Extend lines
commands.description: Extend selections to contain full lines (including end-of-lines).

commands.title: Trim lines
commands.description: Trim selections to only contain full lines (not including last end-of-line).

commands.title: Select to next word start
commands.description: Select the word and following whitespaces on the right of the end of each selection.

commands.title: Select to previous word start
commands.description: Select preceding whitespaces and the word on the left of the end of each selection.

commands.title: Select to next word end
commands.description: Select preceding whitespaces and the word on the right of the end of each selection.

commands.title: Select to next non-whitespace word start
commands.description: Select the non-whitespace word and following whitespaces on the right of the end of each selection.

commands.title: Select to previous non-whitespace word start
commands.description: Select preceding whitespaces and the non-whitespace word on the left of the end of each selection.

commands.title: Select to next non-whitespace word end
commands.description: Select preceding whitespaces and the non-whitespace word on the right of the end of each selection.

commands.title: Select
commands.description: Select within current selections according to a RegExp.

commands.title: Split
commands.description: Split within current selections according to a RegExp.

commands.title: Split lines
commands.description: Split selections into lines.

commands.title: Select first and last characters
commands.description: Select first and last characters of each selection.

commands.title: Copy selection to next line
commands.description: Copy selection to next line.

commands.title: Copy selection to previous line
commands.description: Copy selection to previous line.

commands.title: Reduce selections
commands.description: Reduce selections to their cursor.

commands.title: Flip selections
commands.description: Flip the direction of each selection.

commands.title: Forward selections
commands.description: Ensure selections are in forward direction (the active cursor is after the anchor).

commands.title: Backward selections
commands.description: Ensure selections are in backward direction (the active cursor is before the anchor).

commands.title: Clear selections
commands.description: Clear selections (except main)

commands.title: Clear main selection
commands.description: Clear main selection.

commands.title: Keep matching selections
commands.description: Keep selections that match a RegExp.

commands.title: Clear matching selections
commands.description: Clear selections that match a RegExp.

commands.title: Merge contiguous selections
commands.description: Merge contiguous selections together, including across lines.

commands.title: Align selections
commands.description: Align selections, aligning the cursor of each selection by inserting spaces before the first character of each selection.

commands.title: Copy indentation
commands.description: Copy the indentation of the main selection (or the count one if a count is given) to all other ones.

commands.title: Yank and delete
commands.description: Yank and delete selections.

commands.title: Yank, delete and insert
commands.description: Yank, delete and enter insert mode.

commands.title: Delete without yank
commands.description: Delete selections without yanking.

commands.title: Delete and insert without yank
commands.description: Delete selections without yanking and enter insert mode.

commands.title: Yank
commands.description: Yank selections.

commands.title: Paste after
commands.description: Paste after the end of each selection.

commands.title: Paste before
commands.description: Paste before the start of each selection.

commands.title: Paste after and select
commands.description: Paste after the end of each selection and select pasted text.

commands.title: Paste before and select
commands.description: Paste before the start of each selection and select pasted text.

commands.title: Replace
commands.description: Replace selections with yanked text.

commands.title: Replace with every
commands.description: Replace selections with every yanked text.

commands.title: Replace character
commands.description: Replace each selected character with the next entered one.

commands.title: Join lines
commands.description: Join selected lines.

commands.title: Join lines and select spaces
commands.description: Join selected lines and select spaces inserted in place of line breaks.

commands.title: Indent
commands.description: Indent selected lines.

commands.title: Indent (including empty)
commands.description: Indent selected lines (including empty lines).

commands.title: Deindent
commands.description: Deindent selected lines.

commands.title: Deindent (including incomplete indent)
commands.description: Deindent selected lines (and remove additional incomplete indent).

commands.title: Transform to lowercase
commands.description: Transform to lowercase.

commands.description: Transform to uppercase.

commands.title: Swap case
commands.description: Swap case.

commands.title: Filter through pipe
commands.description: Pipe each selection to a program, and keeps it if the program returns 0.

commands.title: Pipe and replace
commands.description: Pipe each selection to a command, and replaces it with its output.

commands.title: Pipe
commands.description: Pipe each selection to a command, ignoring their results.

commands.title: Pipe and append
commands.description: Pipe each selection to a command, appending the output after the selection.

commands.title: Pipe and prepend
commands.description: Pipe each selection to a command, prepending the output before the selection.

commands.description: Undo.

commands.description: Move backward in history.

commands.description: Move forward in history.
